sentences.english: In the same way, the Lord took the time and effort to stitch you together.
sentences.chinese: 同樣的，上帝也是一針一線把你縫紉起來。

sentences.english: She can sow, so I will sow instead of her tomorrow.
sentences.chinese: 她會縫紉，所以明天我代她去播種。

sentences.english: Section work. Each operator on the assembly line sews only one part of the garment.
sentences.chinese: 生產部門的每個員工在生產線上只縫紉衣服的一部分。

sentences.english: It is an odd thing to have happened to me, but it is what it is. I have become obsessed with sewing.
sentences.chinese: 我感到十分古怪，但就是這樣，我已經爲縫紉而癡迷。

sentences.english: The crew unscrewed the screws from the sewing-machine and chewed them.
sentences.chinese: 海員們從縫紉機上旋下螺釘並咀嚼它們。

sentences.english: In his new home I noticed a sewing-machine and a radio.
sentences.chinese: 在他的新居中，我看到一架縫紉機和一臺收音機。

sentences.english: Jinyun Qilong Machinery Co. , Ltd. mainly produces sewing machine and lock ware.
sentences.chinese: 縉雲啓龍機械有限公司主要生產縫紉機和鎖具。

sentences.english: Stitch the beak, folded in half, to the owl with your sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 把喙對摺，用縫紉機固定在身體上。

sentences.english: It was a sewing machine she was very comfortable with.
sentences.chinese: 這是一臺她用習慣了的縫紉機。

sentences.english: She became the best sewer in the factory.
sentences.chinese: 她成了該廠最好的縫紉工。

sentences.english: Nearby is another classroom where female students learn to sew and make the students' school uniforms.
sentences.chinese: 附近是另一間教室，女孩在這裏學習縫紉和做校服。

sentences.english: She ran up a skirt on her sewing machine.
sentences.chinese: 她用縫紉機快速地縫製了一條裙子。

sentences.english: You can buy clothing patterns and a bigger bag at the sewing store.
sentences.chinese: 在縫紉店不僅可以購買服裝圖紙，也可以擴充揹包。

sentences.english: The causes of wear failure of the shuttle-race were analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了縫紉機梭牀磨損失效原因。

sentences.english: Allowed are natural and synthetic sewing threads.
sentences.chinese: 允許有天然和合成縫紉線。

sentences.english: Young Nina loved to play with the fabrics in her father’s workshop.
sentences.chinese: 尼娜小時候非常喜歡擺弄父親縫紉店裏的各種布料。

definition: paper pattern as model in dressmaking/paper patten
